Umineko Project (UP): Erika had returned to the room that had been given to her on the second floor of the guesthouse.
Steam (ST): Erika had returned to the room that had been given to her, on the second floor of the guesthouse.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Erika had returned to the room on the second floor of the guesthouse that had been given to her.
PC Japanese (JP): ヱリカは、与えられたゲストハウス２階の自室に戻っていた。
Russian (RU): Эрика вернулась в отведённую ей комнату на втором этаже домика для гостей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Erika retornou ao quarto que havia sido preparado para ela no segundo andar da casa de hóspedes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪梨花回到了分配給她的賓館 2 樓她自己的房間。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘梨花回到了分配给她的宾馆 2 楼她自己的房间。

Umineko Project (UP): The next room over was empty. It was very quiet there...
Steam (ST): The next room over was empty. It was very quiet there...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The next room over was empty. It was very quiet there...
PC Japanese (JP): 隣は空室。とても静かな部屋だった…。
Russian (RU): Соседняя комната пустовала. Там было очень тихо...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O quarto ao lado estava vazio. Estava realmente silencioso ali...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 鄰室是空房。此處是個非常安靜的房間…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 邻室是空房。此处是个非常安静的房间…。

Umineko Project (UP): Even pressing her ear against the wall wouldn't enable her to listen in on the voices in the cousins' room.
Steam (ST): Even pressing her ear against the wall wouldn't help her listen in on the voices in the cousin room.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even pressing her ear against the wall wouldn't enable her to listen in on the voices in the cousins' room.
PC Japanese (JP): 耳をつけても、いとこ部屋の声は何も聞くことが出来ない。
Russian (RU): Даже прижав ухо к стене, Эрика не слышала голосов из комнаты кузенов.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo se pressionasse seu ouvido contra a parede, ela não seria capaz de ouvir as vozes que vinham do quarto dos primos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 即便貼上耳朵，也聽不到堂兄妹房間中的任何聲響。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 即便贴上耳朵，也听不到堂兄妹房间中的任何声响。

Umineko Project (UP): Even with hearing power boosted by the detective's authority, it would probably be impossible to make out anything.
Steam (ST): Even with hearing power boosted by the detective's authority, it would probably be impossible to make out anything.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even with hearing power boosted by the detective's authority, it would probably be impossible to make out anything.
PC Japanese (JP): 探偵権限に裏付けられた聴力を以ってしても、何かを気取ることは不可能だろう。
Russian (RU): Даже со слухом, завышенным полномочием детектива, было бы невозможно что‐либо разобрать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo com seu poder auditivo aprimorado pela autoridade do detetive, provavelmente seria impossível fazer qualquer coisa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 縱然用上偵探權限所支持的聽力，也無法探聽到任何動靜吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 纵然用上侦探权限所支持的听力，也无法探听到任何动静吧。

Umineko Project (UP): This room was the farthest down the hall, a long ways away from the cousins' room......
Steam (ST): This room was the farthest down the hall, a long way away from the cousin room...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): This room was the farthest down the hall, a long ways away from the cousins' room......
PC Japanese (JP): この部屋は、いとこ部屋から遠く離された一番奥の部屋だった……。
Russian (RU): Эта комната самая дальняя по коридору, и она далеко от комнаты кузенов......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era o quarto mais longínquo do corredor, muito afastado do quarto dos primos......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這間房間是遠離堂兄妹房間的，最靠裡的房間……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这间房间是远离堂兄妹房间的，最靠里的房间……。

Speaker: Furudo Erika
Umineko Project (UP): "Last time, my room was right next to theirs. ......I see...so he's placed my room farther away this time."
Steam (ST): "And last time, my room was right next to theirs. ...I see, ...so he's placed my room farther away this time."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "And last time, my room was right next to theirs. ......I see...so he's placed my room farther away this time."
PC Japanese (JP): 「前回は私の部屋は、いとこ部屋の隣だったのに。……なるほど、今回は私の部屋を遠ざけてきましたか。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「前回は私の部屋は、いとこ部屋の隣だったのに。……なるほど、今回は私の部屋を遠ざけてきましたか」
Russian (RU): "А в прошлый раз моя комната была рядом с их комнатой. ......Вот как, на этот раз он сделал её дальше."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Na vez passada, meu quarto ficava ao lado do deles. ......Entendo...então ele resolveu me dar um quarto mais afastado dessa vez."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「上次我的房間，明明就在堂兄妹房間旁邊。……原來如此，這次是把我的房間換到遠處了麼？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「上次我的房间，明明就在堂兄妹房间旁边。……原来如此，这次是把我的房间换到远处了么？」

Speaker: Dlanor
Umineko Project (UP): "The powers of authority given to the Game Master permit this level of modification to the initial {f:5:arrangement}. It is, perhaps, a quite reasonable first {f:5:move}."
Steam (ST): "Such a modification to the initial arrangement is well-covered by the authority given to the Game {f:5:Master}. It would seem to be quite a reasonable first {f:5:move}."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "It is a modification of the initial arrangement well covered by the powers of authority given to the Game MASTER. It is, perhaps, a quite reasonable first MOVE."
PC Japanese (JP): 「ゲームマスター権限で許された範囲の、初期配置の変更デス。妥当な初手カト。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ゲームマスター権限で許された範囲の、初期配置の変更デス。妥当な初手カト」
Russian (RU): "Владелец игры имеет право изменять первоначальную {f:5:расстановку}. Вполне разумный первый {f:5:ход}, пожалуй."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Os poderes autoritários concedidos ao Game Master permitem uma modificação desse patamar às preparações {f:5:iniciais}. Um primeiro movimento bem {f:5:compreensível}."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「此乃 GM 權限允許範圍內的變更初期配置。妥當的第一著。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「此乃 GM 权限允许范围内的变更初期配置。妥当的第一着。」

Speaker: Furudo Erika
Umineko Project (UP): "Well, that suits me too. I have no desire to listen to those brats' squeaky voices as they play cards."
Steam (ST): "Well, it's better for me that way too. Like I'd want to hear those brats' squeaky voices as they play cards."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Well, it's better for me that way too. Like I'd want to hear those brats' squeaky voices as they play cards."
PC Japanese (JP): 「まぁ、その方が私もいいです。あのクソガキどもの、トランプで遊ぶ黄色い声なんて、聞きたくもありませんから。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「まぁ、その方が私もいいです。あのクソガキどもの、トランプで遊ぶ黄色い声なんて、聞きたくもありませんから」
Russian (RU): "Впрочем, так даже лучше. Можно подумать, мне очень хочется слушать пискливые голоса тех надоед, играющих в карты."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Bem, isso também combina comigo. Eu não quero ter que ficar ouvindo as vozes daqueles pirralhos enquanto ficam jogando cartas."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我倒也喜歡這樣。畢竟我也不想聽那幫小屁孩們玩牌的煩人吵鬧聲。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我倒也喜欢这样。毕竟我也不想听那帮小屁孩们玩牌的烦人吵闹声。」

Speaker: Dlanor
Russian (RU): [=OG]
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]

Chinese Simplified (CN): [=JPC]

Umineko Project (UP): This whole time, Erika had been sitting at the desk working at something.{n}......She was preparing some of those duct tape seals from before.
Steam (ST): This whole time, Erika had been facing the desk and working on something. ...She was preparing some of those packing tape seals from before.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): This whole time, Erika had been facing the desk and toying with something.......She was preparing some of those duct tape seals from before.
PC Japanese (JP): ヱリカはずっと机に向かって、作業をしていた。それは、……例の、封印のガムテープの製作だった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ヱリカはずっと机に向かって、作業をしていた。{n}それは、……例の、封印のガムテープの製作だった。
Russian (RU): Всё это время Эрика возилась с чем‐то, стоя перед столом.{n}......Как и прежде, готовила печати из клейкой ленты.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Todo esse tempo, Erika esteve ocupada, trabalhando em algo diante de uma mesa. ......Ela estava preparando seus selos de fita kraft que utilizou no jogo passado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪梨花一直面對著桌子，忙她的活。{n}這是在，……製造那封印的膠帶。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘梨花一直面对着桌子，忙她的活。{n}这是在，……制造那封印的胶带。

Umineko Project (UP): She had asked Kumasawa for the stickiest tape available.
Steam (ST): She had asked Kumasawa for the stickiest tape in the place.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She had asked Kumasawa for the stickiest tape in the place.
PC Japanese (JP): 熊沢に一番粘着力の強いガムテープを所望したのだ。
Russian (RU): Эрика одолжила у Кумасавы самую липкую ленту.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Erika havia pedido à Kumasawa pela fita gomada com maior poder adesivo que tivesse.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她拜託熊澤拿來了粘力最強的膠帶。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她拜托熊泽拿来了粘力最强的胶带。

Umineko Project (UP): She drew a complicated, unforgeable signature on it with a permanent marker, then added slits through it.
Steam (ST): She drew a complicated signature that could not be counterfeited across it with a permanent marker, then began making notches across it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She drew a complicated signature that could not be counterfeited across it with a permanent marker, then began making notches across it.
PC Japanese (JP): それに油性マジックで複製不能の複雑なサインを書き入れ、切れ目を入れる。
Russian (RU): Она нарисовала перманентным маркером сложную подпись, которую нельзя подделать, а затем начала делать надрезы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela traçou uma assinatura complexa e inesquecível usando uma caneta permanente e fez vincos na fita.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 用油性簽字筆簽上無法模仿的複雜簽名，再剪條縫。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 用油性签字笔签上无法模仿的复杂签名，再剪条缝。

Umineko Project (UP): By sticking this over a place that she wanted to prove had remained closed, she could create a powerful seal equal in strength to the red truth.
Steam (ST): This way, if she ever wanted to prove that some opening had remained closed, she could stick this tape over it, creating a powerful seal equal in strength to the red truth.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): This way, she could stick this over a place that she wanted to prove had been closed, creating a powerful seal equal in strength to the red truth.
PC Japanese (JP): こうして、塞がれていたことを証明したい箇所に貼り付けることで、それは赤き真実に匹敵する強力な封印となる。
Russian (RU): Так она могла обклеить место, чтобы доказать, что оно было закрытым, создавая мощные печати, по силе равные красной правде.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Colando isso em todos os lugares que ela queria provar que permaneceram fechados, Erika poderia criar um poderoso selo de poder equivalente a uma verdade vermelha.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 像這樣，通過將它們貼在想證明已被封住之處上，它們即會化為可以匹敵紅色真實的強力封印。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 像这样，通过将它们贴在想证明已被封住之处上，它们即会化为可以匹敌红色真实的强力封印。

Umineko Project (UP): Those menacing seals had cornered Natsuhi so thoroughly in the previous game...
Steam (ST): These menacing seals had cornered Natsuhi so thoroughly in the previous game...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Those menacing seals had cornered Natsuhi so thoroughly in the previous game...
PC Japanese (JP): 前回のゲームで猛威を振るい、夏妃を徹底的に追い詰めた、あの封印だ…。
Russian (RU): Те самые устрашающие печати, поэтапно загнавшие Нацухи в угол в предыдущей игре...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Esses selos ameaçadores já haviam encurralado Natsuhi no decorrer do jogo anterior...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 此即是，在上盤遊戲中大展神威，將夏妃徹底逼上絕路的，那個封印…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 此即是，在上盘游戏中大展神威，将夏妃彻底逼上绝路的，那个封印…。

Speaker: Dlanor
Umineko Project (UP): "Is something {f:5:wrong}?"
Steam (ST): "Is something {f:5:wrong}?"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「怎么了？」

Speaker: Furudo Erika
Umineko Project (UP): "......He got me. ......That Battler doesn't let anything get by him, does he?"
Steam (ST): "...He got me. ...That Battler doesn't let anything get by him, does he?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……やられました。……戦人め、周到ですね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……やられました。……戦人め、周到ですね」
Russian (RU): "......Баттлер меня раскусил. ......Ничто не упускает."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Ele me pegou. ......Aquele Battler é mesmo meticuloso?"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……被摆了一道呢。……死战人，好是准备周到。」

Umineko Project (UP): Erika shrugged and showed the piece of duct tape she had cut off to Dlanor.
Steam (ST): Erika grimaced and showed the piece of packing tape she had torn off to Dlanor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Erika shrugged and showed the piece of duct tape she had torn off to Dlanor.
PC Japanese (JP): ヱリカは肩を竦めて、切り取ったガムテープ片をドラノールに示す。
Russian (RU): Эрика пожала плечами и показала Дланор кусок оторванной ленты.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Erika deu de ombros e mostrou para Dlanor um pedaço de fita que ela havia cortado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪梨花聳了聳肩，把剪下來的膠帶拿給德拉諾爾看。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘梨花耸了耸肩，把剪下来的胶带拿给德拉诺尔看。

Umineko Project (UP): By sight alone, Dlanor couldn't tell what had annoyed Erika.{n}However, as soon as she held the tape, she realized the difference right away.
Steam (ST): At a glance, Dlanor couldn't tell what had annoyed Erika. However, as soon as she held it, she realized the difference right away.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At a glance, Dlanor couldn't tell what had annoyed Erika. However, as soon as she held it, she realized the difference right away.
PC Japanese (JP): 一見しただけでは、ヱリカが何を不満なのかわからない。しかしそれを受け取ってすぐに、違いに気が付いた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 一見しただけでは、ヱリカが何を不満なのかわからない。{n}しかしそれを受け取ってすぐに、違いに気が付いた。
Russian (RU): С первого взгляда Дланор не могла сказать, что раздосадовало Эрику.{n}Однако, взяв в руки, она тут же увидела разницу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Assim que o viu, Dlanor não foi capaz de entender o que estava irritando Erika.{n}Porém, assim que segurou a fita, ela percebeu a diferença imediatamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 只看一眼，是無法明白繪梨花有何不滿的。{n}不過一接過那膠帶，就當即明白哪不對了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 只看一眼，是无法明白绘梨花有何不满的。{n}不过一接过那胶带，就当即明白哪不对了。

Speaker: Dlanor
Umineko Project (UP): "......This won't be any {f:5:good}."
Steam (ST): "...This won't be any {f:5:good}."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......This won't be any GOOD."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……これでは駄目デス。」
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Isso não é nada {f:5:bom}."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……這樣可不行呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……这样可不行呢。」

Speaker: Furudo Erika
Umineko Project (UP): "Yes. It's barely sticky at all. This won't reach even close to the red truth."
Steam (ST): "Yep. It's barely sticky at all. This won't reach even close to the red truth."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Yep. It's barely sticky at all. This won't reach even close to the red truth."
PC Japanese (JP): 「えぇ。粘着力、ほとんどないです。これじゃ、赤き真実には至れない。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「えぇ。粘着力、ほとんどないです。これじゃ、赤き真実には至れない」
Russian (RU): "Да. Она едва липкая. И близко не дотягивает до красной правды."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Pois é. Praticamente não gruda. Isto sequer chega perto de uma verdade vermelha."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嗯。几乎没粘力。这样子，是无法成为红色真实的。」

Umineko Project (UP): Even duct tape can be of low quality, and it sometimes gets weaker with age.
Steam (ST): Even packing tape can be of low quality, and it sometimes gets weaker with age.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ガムテープも、品質の悪いものもあれば、経年で劣化するものもある。
Russian (RU): Даже клейкая лента может быть низкого качества, и с годами она слабеет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Até mesmo fitas gomadas podem ser de qualidade duvidosa, e algumas vezes perde adesão conforme envelhece.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 这些胶带，既有质量不行的，还有放了好几年的粘力变弱之物。

Umineko Project (UP): The tape Kumasawa had found was a bit too weak even for normal use. It wasn't nearly sticky enough to be used as a detective's seal.
Steam (ST): The tape Kumasawa had found was a bit too weak even for normal use. It wasn't nearly sticky enough to be used as a detective's seal.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The tape Kumasawa had found was a bit too weak even for normal use. It wasn't nearly sticky enough to be used as a detective's seal.
PC Japanese (JP): 熊沢に持ってきてもらったそれは、本来の用途でも少々微妙。探偵の封印として使うには、まったく粘着力の足りないものだった。
Russian (RU): Лента, найденная Кумасавой, оказалась слишком слаба даже для обычного использования. Она была недостаточно липкой для печатей детектива.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A fita que Kumasawa havia encontrado era fraca demais até mesmo para usos convencionais. Ela não tinha adesão o bastante para ser usada como um selo de detetive.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 拜託熊澤所拿來的膠帶，即便是用在本來用途上都稍顯微妙。要作為偵探封印使用的話，其粘力全然不夠。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 拜托熊泽所拿来的胶带，即便是用在本来用途上都稍显微妙。要作为侦探封印使用的话，其粘力全然不够。

Umineko Project (UP): "It is possible to tear it off {f:5:cleanly}. This cannot serve as proof of a {f:5:seal}."
Steam (ST): "It is possible to tear it off {f:5:cleanly}. This cannot count as proof of a {f:5:seal}."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "It is possible to tear it off CLEANLY. This cannot count as proof of a SEAL."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「綺麗に剥がすことが可能デス。これでは、封印を示す証拠にはなりえマセン」

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「能够不留痕迹地撕下。这样子是无法成为封印的证据的。」

Umineko Project (UP): "......I guess Battler isn't as totally incompetent as I thought. He probably tampered with all the duct tape on the island using the authority of the Game Master."
Steam (ST): "...I guess Battler isn't as totally incompetent as I thought. He probably tampered with all the packing tape on the island using the authority of the Game Master."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……戦人も、そこまで見下げ果てたほど、無能じゃないってことですね。おそらく、ゲームマスター権限で、この島の全てのガムテープに干渉したんでしょう」

Alguém esqueceu uma coisa.’{n}A pia e o lixinho ao lado estavam sempre limpos.{n}Havia recibos e cartões de pontos de lugares que ele não costumava ir.}
Chinese Traditional (CHT): {e:090:做多了的咖喱。{n}變多了的戲劇排練。{n}廚房紙巾的疊法。{n}我已經吃過了。{n}開始懂化妝用具了。{n}抱歉，我在睡覺。{n}馬桶蓋蓋著。{n}在舞台同伴那過夜。{n}一起搞戲劇的同伴在這聚著喝了點酒。是誰落下的東西。{n}變乾淨了的排水溝與三角水槽。{n}活動範圍外的收據、積分卡。}

Chinese Traditional (CHT): {e:090:我找到了許多，我愛過你的證據。{n}我找到了許多，你愛過我的證據。{n}唯獨你沒出軌的證據，就是找不到。}

Umineko Project (UP): {e:090:Give it a rest. If you love me, then trust me. If you can't do that, then you don't love me anymore. How could I love someone like that? I'll treasure you for all my life, but I want to do well in theater just as much. You said you liked seeing me act, right? So why are you telling me to stop acting now? Why do I have to choose between you and acting? What's wrong with you? I'm seriously tired of this, alright? Look, if all we do is fight when we see each other, maybe we both need some time to cool off, okay? I need to concentrate for my next performance anyway. One of my colleagues, she's suddenly told us she won't be able to perform. I need to rewrite the script by tomorrow. I don't have the time for this.}
Steam (ST): {e:090:Give it a rest. If you love me, then trust me. If you can't do that, then you don't love me anymore. How could I love someone like that? I'll treasure you for all my life, and I want to do well in theater just as much. You said you liked seeing me act, right? So why are you telling me to stop acting now? Why do I have to choose between you and acting? What's wrong with you? I'm seriously worn out, okay? I'll treasure you for all my life, but I want to do well in theater just as much. You said you liked seeing me act, right? So why are you telling me to stop acting now? Why do I have to choose between you and acting? What's wrong with you? I'm seriously worn out, alright? Come on, if all we do is fight when we see each other, maybe we both need some time to cool off, okay? I need to concentrate for my next performance anyway. There's this senior girl who suddenly said she wouldn't be able to perform. I need to rewrite the script by tomorrow. I don't have the time for this.
PC Japanese (JP): {e:090:いい加減にしろよ、俺のこと愛してんなら信じろよ。それが出来ないなら、お前はもう俺のことを愛してないんだよ。そんなやつ、俺だって愛せるわけねえだろ。お前を一生大事にするし、演劇も同じくらい頑張りたいんだよ。お前は演劇やってる俺が好きだって言ったろ。そのお前が何で演劇やめろなんて言い出すんだよ。どうしてお前と演劇のどっちかなんてことになるんだよ。お前、変だよ、疲れてんだろマジで。あのさ、お互いの顔見て喧嘩しかしないんなら、お互い少し冷却期間を置かね？　俺も次の舞台まで集中したいし。先輩のとこの女の子、急に出れないとか言い出してさ。脚本、明日までに書き換えなくちゃならないんだよ。こうしてる時間も惜しいわけ。}
Russian (RU): {e:090:Хватит уже. Если любишь — верь мне. А если не можешь, значит, ты разлюбила меня. Как я могу любить такого человека? Я буду дорожить тобой всю свою жизнь, но хочу и преуспевать в театре. Ты сказала, что тебе понравилась моя актёрская игра. Так почему ты теперь говоришь мне перестать? Почему я должен выбирать между тобой и театром? Да что с тобой? Ты меня замучила. Если мы только ругаемся, когда видимся, может, нам взять перерыв, чтобы остудить головы? Мне всё равно нужно сосредоточиться на следующей роли. Моя коллега вдруг сказала, что не сможет выступить. Я должен к завтрашнему дню переписать сценарий. Мне некогда}.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): {e:090:Para com isso. Se me ama, então confie em mim. Se não consegue fazer isso, então não me ame mais. Como eu posso amar alguém assim? Irei valorizá‐la ao máximo, mas eu também quero muito participar do teatro. Você mesma disse que gosta de me ver atuando, não disse? Então por que está dizendo para eu parar agora? Por que eu tenho que escolher entre você e o teatro? Qual o seu problema? Eu já cansei disso, entendeu? Olha, se tudo o que fizermos for brigar sempre que nos encontrarmos, então talvez seja melhor ambos darem um tempo, tá? Eu preciso mesmo me concentrar para a próxima peça. Do nada a garota que fazia par com um colega disse que não poderia mais se apresentar. Eu preciso reescrever o roteiro até amanhã. Não tenho mais tempo pra isso.}
Chinese Traditional (CHT): {e:090:你適可而止好不好？愛我的話就相信我。做不到就代表著你已經不愛我了。這副樣子你叫我怎麼愛？我會好好待你一輩子的，但我也想同等程度地努力搞好戲劇啊。你不是說過，你喜歡搞戲劇的我嗎？可你為什麼又叫我別搞戲劇了啊？怎麼就變成你和戲劇二選一了啊？你真的好怪啊，說真的我累了。我說，既然咱們見面只有吵架，那要不給彼此點冷靜下來的時間如何？正好下次演出前，我也想集中集中精力。前輩那邊的女孩子突然說沒法出場。我還得在明天前改好劇本呢。所以沒時間和你吵。}
Chinese Simplified (CN): {e:090:你适可而止好不好？爱我的话就相信我。做不到就代表着你已经不爱我了。这副样子你叫我怎么爱？我会好好待你一辈子的，但我也想同等程度地努力搞好戏剧啊。你不是说过，你喜欢搞戏剧的我吗？可你为什么又叫我别搞戏剧了啊？怎么就变成你和戏剧二选一了啊？你真的好怪啊，说真的我累了。我说，既然咱们见面只有吵架，那要不给彼此点冷静下来的时间如何？正好下次演出前，我也想集中集中精力。前辈那边的女孩子突然说没法出场。我还得在明天前改好剧本呢。所以没时间和你吵。}

Umineko Project (UP): {e:090:You know what, if you really find it that hard to trust me, we're through. Don't bother coming over again, just go home, I don't love you anymore. Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}
Umineko Project (UP): "Those lessons were a pain for us parents too!! But for you, that was the most effective one! The monthly fee was high, and it was a pain to have to spend Friday nights there every week!! But it was the most effective! That's when I realized!! Kids don't grow unless their parents watch over them!! If children are sprouts, then parents are the sun! No plants will bud, and no flowers will bloom without the sun!!"
Steam (ST): "That school was hard on us parents too!! But for you, it was the most effective one! The monthly fee was high, and it was a pain to have to spend Friday nights there every week!! But it did more for you than anything else! That's when I realized!! Kids don't grow unless their parents watch over them!! If children are sprouts, then parents are the sun! No plants will bud, and no flowers will bloom without the sun!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That school was a pain for us parents too!! But for you, that was the most effective one! The monthly fee was high, and it was a pain to have to spend Friday nights there every week!! But it was the most effective! That's when I realized!! Kids don't grow unless their parents watch over them!! If children are sprouts, then parents are the sun!  No plants will bud, and no flowers will bloom without the sun!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「親にとっても辛い塾だったわねェ！！　でもあれが一番、あんたには効果的だったわ！　高いお月謝、毎週、金曜の夜を費やさなければならない面倒！！　でもね、一番効果があった！　その時悟ったの！！　子供はね、親が見ていないと伸びないの！！　子が芽なら親は太陽だわ！　太陽なくして芽吹く草木も、咲かせる花も存在しないの！！」
Russian (RU): "Эта школа была мучением и для нас, родителей! Но для тебя так было эффективнее всего! Ежемесячная плата была огромной, и было трудно проводить там каждый вечер по пятницам! Но так было эффективнее всего! Вот тогда я и поняла! Дети не растут, если их родители не смотрят за ними! Если дети — ростки, тогда родители — солнце! На ростках не будет и бутона, и цветы не цветут без солнца!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Essas lições também eram horríveis para nós, pais!! Mas, no seu caso, eram as mais efetivas! As dispensas mensais eram altas, e era horrível ter que passar todas as noites de sexta fazendo isso semanalmente!! Mas era a forma mais efetiva! Foi quando eu me dei conta!! Crianças não crescem se os pais não cuidarem delas!! Se crianças são brotos, então os pais são o Sol! Sem ele, nenhuma planta cresce e nenhuma flor floresce!!"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那对家长来说，也是个吃不消的辅导班哦！！但是这个班对你最有效！高月费，每周，都不得不花费掉星期五晚上的那份麻烦！！但是呢，最有效！在那时我悟到了！！小孩子呀，没父母看着，就不会伸长！！小孩是嫩芽的话，父母就是太阳！没有太阳，就不会有发芽的草木，开放的鲜花！！」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........E então vinha o domingo, seguido pela segunda, quando eu não tinha nenhuma atividade fora da escola — os únicos dois dias onde eu tinha algum descanso. .........É mesmo irônico. Então eram essas aulas extras de terça a sábado que ficavam me restringido o tempo todo. ......Eu era mesmo como o Sun Wukong."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………而接著所迎來的星期天，與不用上輔導的星期一，唯獨這兩天是我的休息日。………真是諷刺。我是一直在被星期二到星期六的學習輔導，壓得動彈不得麼？……我即正是那孫悟空呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………而接着所迎来的星期天，与不用上辅导的星期一，唯独这两天是我的休息日。………真是讽刺。我是一直在被星期二到星期六的学习辅导，压得动弹不得么？……我即正是那孙悟空呢。」

Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}

PC Japanese (JP): 「くっくくっくっく！！そうね、私の手の平から逃れたいなんて思い上がりは、お釈迦様に五行山で潰してもらうといいわぁ！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「くっくくっくっく！！　そうね、私の手の平から逃れたいなんて思い上がりは、お釈迦様に五行山で潰してもらうといいわぁ！！」

Umineko Project (UP): Sun Wukong, who wanted to become a god, was crushed by the five mountains of fire, water, wood, metal, and earth, and sealed away. These are the five elements that the days of the week, Tuesday through Saturday, are named after in Japanese.
Steam (ST): Sun Wukong, who wanted to become a god, was crushed by the five mountains of fire, water, wood, metal, and earth, and sealed away. These are the five elements that the days of the week, Tuesday through Saturday, are named after in Japanese.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 神の座を欲した孫悟空は、火、水、木、金、土、の五つの行を司る五つの山に押し潰されて封じられた。
Russian (RU): Сунь Укун, пожелавший стать богом, был сокрушён пятью горами — огня, воды, дерева, металла и земли — и запечатан. Эти пять элементов в Японии — дни недели со вторника по субботу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sun Wukong, aquele que almejava se tornar um deus, acabou sendo esmagado pelas cinco montanhas: fogo, água, madeira, metal e terra, e assim foi selado. Esses são os cinco elementos que representam os dias da semana em japonês, da terça‐feira ao sábado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 想得到神的寶座的孫悟空，被掌管{c:86EF9C:火、水、木、金、土}，五行的五座大山壓在山下，封印了起來。{c:86EF9C:（詳見魔導書同名條目）}
Chinese Simplified (CN): 想得到神的宝座的孙悟空，被掌管{c:86EF9C:火、水、木、金、土}，五行的五座大山压在山下，封印了起来。{c:86EF9C:（详见魔导书同名条目）}

Umineko Project (UP): Only now did George, who had always admired Sun Wukong, recognize this greatest of ironies.
Steam (ST): Only now did George, who had always admired Sun Wukong, recognize this greatest of ironies.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Only now did George, who had always admired Sun Wukong, recognize this greatest of ironies.
PC Japanese (JP): 孫悟空に憧れた譲治にとって、この歳になって気付く最大の皮肉だった。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Só agora George, que sempre admirou Sun Wukong, percebeu esta que era a maior das ironias.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對於憧憬孫悟空的讓治來說，此乃到這歲數才意識到的最大的諷刺。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对于憧憬孙悟空的让治来说，此乃到这岁数才意识到的最大的讽刺。

Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}
Umineko Project (UP): "Just like Sun Wukong, you need some reflection and punishment for your arrogance. If you show that you're willing to reform yourself, I'll release you."

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Assim como Sun Wukong, você precisa refletir um pouquinho e ser punido por sua arrogância. Eu posso libertar você se estiver disposto a mudar sua conduta."

Umineko Project (UP): "A first step? Don't make me laugh. You still haven't even been born yet!! This isn't my web that you're caught in. ......You're inside my caring, nurturing wo{-}o{-}o{-}o{-}omb!!!"

Umineko Project (UP): George was slammed against the ground over and over.
Steam (ST): George was slammed against the ground over and over.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Steam (ST): ...It was a heartless atrocity, unlike anything one would expect a blood-related son to receive.

Russian (RU): ......Бессердечное злодеяние, точно не для кровного сына.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Era uma crueldade impiedosa, diferente de tudo que se espera que um filho de sangue possa receber.

Steam (ST): However, in Eva's eyes, ...perhaps even this was a sign of love for her precious son...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, in Eva's eyes, ......perhaps even this was a sign of love for her precious son...

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, ......ao olhos de Eva, ......é possível que até mesmo isso fosse uma forma de demonstrar amor pelo seu precioso filho...

Umineko Project (UP): The human‐shaped lump of flesh ensnared in the red net was slammed over and over, then thrown high into the air, ......where it was caught by a massive spiderweb suspended in the sky.
Steam (ST): The human-shaped lump of flesh wrapped in the red bag was slammed over and over, then thrown high into the air, ...where it was caught in a massive spiderweb in the sky, still covered with fresh blood.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The human-shaped lump of flesh wrapped in the red bag was slammed over and over, then thrown high into the air......where it was caught in a massive spiderweb in the sky, still covered with fresh blood.
PC Japanese (JP): 赤い網袋に閉じ込められた人型の肉塊が、何度も叩き潰され、そして天に打ち上げられ、……全身を鮮血で彩った無残な姿を大の字にして、天の巨大な蜘蛛の巣に磔にする。
Russian (RU): Кусок мяса человеческой формы, завёрнутый в красный мешок, множество раз ударился о землю, после чего его подбросило высоко в воздух...... где, по‐прежнему в свежей крови, он попал в огромную паутину в небе.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O nódulo de carne em forma humana, enredado pela rede da verdade, foi jogado contra o chão incontáveis vezes, sendo então atirado para cima, ......onde foi capturado por uma imensa teia de aranha suspensa no céu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 被困在紅色網袋中的人形肉塊，被一次又一次地砸到地上、甩回半空，……全身被鮮血染紅的他呈一個悲慘的大字，被天空巨大的蜘蛛網晾在半空。

Umineko Project (UP): George hung there pitifully as though crucified, still covered in fresh blood and not even twitching...
Steam (ST): While he hung there as though crucified, George didn't even twitch...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): While he hung there as though crucified, George did not even twitch...

Umineko Project (UP): For the versions of themselves to whom the game board was the only world, this was a tragic parricide, ......but for these ones who sat around the game board in this witch's tea room, ......it was nothing more than a movement of the pieces, representing George's will to overcome his parents.
Steam (ST): For the versions of themselves to whom the game board was the only world, this was a tragic parricide, ...but to those who stood around the game board in this witch's smoking room, ...it was nothing more than a movement of the pieces, representing George's will to overcome his parents.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): For the versions of themselves to whom the game board was the only world, this was a tragic parricide, ......but to these ones who stood around the game board in this witch's smoking room... it was nothing more than a movement of the pieces, representing George's will to overcome his parents.
PC Japanese (JP): ゲーム盤を唯一の世界とする“彼ら”には、それは痛ましい親殺しだが、……この魔女の喫茶室でゲーム盤を囲む“彼ら”には、……それは親を超える意思を、駒の動きで示しただけに過ぎない。
Russian (RU): Для них, у кого единственный мир — игровая доска, это было трагическое матереубийство...... но те, кто стоял за игровым полем в курилке ведьмы, просто двигали фигурами, представляя желание Джорджа пересилить своих родителей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Para as versões deles mesmo, que residiam apenas no mundo do tabuleiro, foi um trágio parricídio, ......mas, para aqueles que estavam sentados diante do tabuleiro localizado na sala de chá da bruxa, ......não passou de um simples movimento de peças, representando a intenção de George de superar seus pais.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然對把棋盤視為唯一的世界的“他們”來說，此乃慘烈的弒母，……但對在這間魔女茶室圍著棋盤的“他們”來說，……這就只不過是在通過落子，展示出超越父母的意志。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然对把棋盘视为唯一的世界的“他们”来说，此乃惨烈的弑母，……但对在这间魔女茶室围着棋盘的“他们”来说，……这就只不过是在通过落子，展示出超越父母的意志。

Umineko Project (UP): However, even if it was just a single life within one of an infinite number of fragment worlds, ......the fact remained that the demons had forced him to take it...
Steam (ST): However, the fact remained that the demons had ordered them to take these lives, ...even if it was just within one of the endless Fragment worlds...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, the fact remained that the demons had ordered them to take these lives, ......even if it was just within one of the endless Fragment worlds...
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、無限にあるカケラの世界の中のほんの一つであっても。……悪魔たちは、命を捧げさせることを強いたのだ…。
Russian (RU): Однако факт остаётся фактом — демоны приказали им забрать эти жизни...... пусть даже в одном из бесчисленных миров фрагментов...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, mesmo que fosse uma única vida dentre um infinito número de Fragmentos de mundo, ......ainda permanecia a verdade de que os demônios o forçaram a tomar uma vida...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可是，哪怕只是無限碎片世界中的其中之一。……惡魔們也是在強逼其奪取性命…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可是，哪怕只是无限碎片世界中的其中之一。……恶魔们也是在强逼其夺取性命…。

Umineko Project (UP): George appeared to have distanced himself from the events on the demons' game board, ......but Jessica still seemed to resist the idea of stealing another person's life, even if it was only their life as a game piece.
Steam (ST): George appeared to have distanced himself from the events on the demons' game board, ...but Jessica still seemed to resist the idea of stealing another person's life, even if it was only their life as a piece on the game board.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): George appeared to have distanced himself from the events on the demons' game board, ......but Jessica still seemed to resist the idea of stealing another person's life, even if it was only their life as a piece on the game board.
PC Japanese (JP): 譲治は、悪魔のゲーム上のことと割り切れているようだが、……朱志香には、たとえ駒であっても命を奪わねばならぬことに、未だ抵抗を持っているようだった。
Russian (RU): Джордж уже оправился от событий на игровой доске демонов...... но Джессика всё ещё сопротивлялась идее лишить другого человека жизни, даже если это только жизнь его фигуры на игровом поле.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): George aparentou ter se distanciado dos eventos que ocorriam no tabuleiro dos demônios, ......mas Jessica ainda permanecia resistente à ideia de tomar a vida de outra pessoa, mesmo que essa vida fosse apenas uma peça do jogo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然讓治好像是將此當成了惡魔遊戲中的事想通了，……但朱志香貌似還是依然對非要奪人性命抱有抵觸情緒，即使那是棋子。
